properties.name: Big Four Depot (Springfield)
properties.description: This marker is placed at the historic location  of the Big Four Deport, a passenger station that was demolished in 1969.

properties.name: Columbus Convention Center Station
properties.description: The current plan is to locate Columbus' railroad station underneath the Convention Center, for ease of access to parking, amenities, and transit.
properties.connections: Amtrak 3C+D, Chicago-Pittsburgh, and Dallas-NYC routes. COTA lines 1, 2, 5, 9, 75, and 102

properties.name: John Glenn Columbus International Airport
properties.description: Plans for a "multimodal transit center" near the airport have ben brought up on and off for years, but the tracks don't run very close to the airport. A last-mile shuttlebus or airport peoplemover will be needed.
properties.connections: COTA lines 7 and 23. Airport shuttles and rental car center. Airport. Amtrak 3C+D, Dallas-NYC. and Chicago-Pittsburgh.

properties.name: Coshocton Station
properties.description: There's no historic station here, so I've chosen an open undeveloped plot of land that's centrally located.

properties.name: Pittsburgh Union Station
properties.description: Yinz c'mon in and get some coffee.

properties.name: Hilliard Station
properties.description: This location is based on Hilliard's 2024 station placement study, which identified a cluster of four properties on either side of the station at this location, all of which are owned by the City of Hilliar.

properties.name: Fort Worth, Texas
properties.description: Existing Amtrak Station

properties.name: Oklahoma City Santa Fe Depot
properties.description: Existing Amrak Station

properties.name: Tulsa Union Depot
properties.description: Former location of the Tulsa Union Depot; current location of the "Oklahoma Jazz Hall of Fame" and the "Center of the Universe" park.

properties.name: St. Louis Union Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak Station

properties.name: Terre Haute Station
properties.description: Former location of Terre Haute Amtrak station, sometimes known as "Big Four" station.

properties.name: Indianapolis Union Station
properties.description: Existing location of Indianapolis' Amtrak Station

properties.name: Willam H. Gray III 30th Street Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak Station on the Northeast Corridor

properties.name: Penn Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak Station in NYC; Moynihan Trani Hall.

properties.name: 3C+D
properties.description: This route is the State of Ohio's biggest priority, and it might be the first of these tracks to get into service.

properties.name: Cleveland-Toledo-Detroit
properties.description: This new service connects Cleveland to Detroit, and on the basis of Amtrak's planning notes, I've extended it to Pontiac.

This route was sponsored not by the State of Ohio, but by the Northern Indiana Passenger Rail Association and the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission. The route follows existing freight rail tracks, but requires extensive maintenance before passenger rail can begin.
properties.name: Chicago-Pittsburgh
Cleveland Station
properties.description: First stop on the new Cleveland-Detroit route. This is the current location of the Cleveland Amtrak Station; it's quite inaccessible. There are rumors about potentially building a new station in a better location, or improving pedestrian and transit access to this station.
properties.connections: Amtrak Lake Shore Limited and Capitol Limited. GCRTA Blue/Green/Waterfront Line.

properties.name: Cleveland Hopkins International Airport
properties.description: New station. The problem with trying to place a railroad station at Cleveland Hopkins is that there's no real good space for it. So, the plans place the actual Amtrak station at the Puritas station of Cleveland's light-rail line.
properties.connections: Amtrak Lake Shore Limited and Capitol Limited. GCRTA Blue/Green/Waterfront Line.

properties.name: Elyria Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak station.
properties.connections: Amtrak Lake Shore Limited and Capitol Limited

properties.name: Sandusky Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak stop
properties.connections: Amtrak Lake Shore Limited and Capitol Limited

properties.name: Toledo Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak station.
properties.connections: Amtrak Lake Shore Limited and Capitol Limited.

properties.name: Detroit Airport
properties.description: This new stop location is included based on the Amtrak Connects US website description of a Cleveland-Detroit-Pontiac line.

properties.name: Dearborn
properties.description: This marker is placed at an existing station.
properties.connections: Mighican Wolverines service, proposed Chicago-Toronto line

properties.name: Detroit
properties.description: This marker is placed at an existing station.
properties.connections: Mighican Wolverines service, proposed Amtrak Chicago-Toronto line

properties.name: Troy
properties.description: This existing station location is included based on the Amtrak Connects US website description of a Cleveland-Detroit-Pontiac line.
This existing station location is included based on the Amtrak Connects US website description of a Cleveland-Detroit-Pontiac line.
properties.name: Pontiac
Cincinnati Union Station
properties.description: Southernmost stop on the 3C+D line.
properties.connections: Amtrak's Cardinal; Cincinnati Metro lines 49 and 31; Dallas-NYC;

properties.name: Sharonville
properties.description: Possible future location of a Sharonville stop for the 3C+D route, as specified in Senator Brown's press release.

properties.name: Dayton Union Station
properties.description: This marker is placed at the historical location of Dayton Union Station.

properties.name: Big Four Depot (Delaware)
properties.description: Sixth stop on 3C+D. This historic building could be renovated for use as the railroad station, if Amtrak uses the CSX tracks to get to Cleveland from Columbus.

properties.name: Crestline Station
properties.description: Seventh stop on 3C+D. I wasn't able to find information on the historical location of the Crestline railroad station, so I've plonked this marker down next to an empty parking lot. No new stops from here to the Cleveland airport.
This existing station is heavily trafficked.
properties.connections: Amtrak's Capitol Limited, Lake Shore Limited, Pennsylvanian, Pere Marquette, Hoosier State, City of New Orleans, California Zephyr, Southwest Chief, Empire Bulder, Hiawatha Service, Quincy, and Wolverine service. CTA buses and metros. METRA commuter trains on the North Central, Milwaukee District, Milwaukee District North, BNSF, and Southwest Service lines.
properties.name: Chicago Union Station

properties.description: This marker's location is speculative. To get to Hobart, Amtrak has to take this track through Gary, but there's no existing station in Gary on this line.
properties.name: Gary Station

properties.description: Location of former Amtrak station that can be reopened.
properties.name: Hobart Station

properties.description: Location of former Amtrak station that can be reopened.
properties.name: Valparaiso Station
Plymouth Station
properties.description: Location of historic Plymouth Pennsylvania Railroad Station, which could be refurbished and reopened.

properties.name: Warsaw Station
properties.description: Location of historic Warsaw Pennsylvania Railroad Station

properties.name: Baker Street Station, Fory Wayne
properties.description: Location of historic trail station in Fort Wayne. This station might have to be reclaimed from its current use as a music hall.

properties.name: Lima Station
properties.description: Location of historic railroad station on the Panhandle Route through Ohio

properties.name: Kenton Station
properties.description: There's no historic location here; I chose this spot because it's the biggest open tract of land where a stopped train wouldn't block three bridges at once.

properties.name: Marysville Station
properties.description: There's no historic location here; this is just some empty land between two major streets with easy access to a bike trail

properties.name: Dublin Station
properties.connections: Thought this station isn't in Amtrak's plans, the City of Dublin plans to build a rail station here.

properties.name: Newark Station
properties.description: There's no historic station in Newark, and no open land, so I've chosen to replace the Licking County Litter & Recycle drop-off with a station.

properties.name: Newcomerstown Station
properties.description: There's no historic station here, so I chose to put the station in an empty centrally-located plot. Alternative locations avoiding road crossings would put the station east or west of town.

properties.name: Dennison Depot
properties.description: This historic railroad station in Uhrichsville is an active museum, but could be used as a working station.

properties.name: Steubenville Station
properties.description: There's no historic station here, so I chose an empty parking lot near downtown Steubenville

properties.name: Springfield Station
properties.description: Placed by throwing a dart at a map of Springfield, not quite. It's hard to place a station near the densest population areas of Springfield that isn't in conflict with freight trains.

properties.name: Dallas-NYC
properties.description: This is a rouh approximation of a line between Dallas and NYC, based on Amtrak planning.

properties.name: Union Passenger Terminal
properties.description: Existing Amtrak Station

properties.name: Mobile Station
properties.description: Former Amtrak Station, demolished in 2007.

properties.name: Montgomery Union Station
properties.description: Historic train station in Montgomery; service ended in 1979 and the building is used for commercial tenants.

properties.name: Birmingham Station
properties.description: Existing Amtrak station

properties.name: Nashville Union Station
properties.description: Location of former Amtrak station; service stopped in 1979. Currently used as a hotel

properties.name: Bowling Green Historic Railpark and Train Museum
properties.description: Former train station; service stopped in 1979. Currently used as a museum.

properties.name: Union Station
properties.description: Historic location of Amtrak train station in Louisville. Service stoped in 1979, with a temporary slow service from 2001 to 2003.

properties.name: New Orleans-Detroit
properties.description: This proposed route was identified in the 2024 FRA Long-Distance Rail Study.
